title: Topic 003 Question 033
body: You have a Microsoft 365 tenant that uses records management.
You use a retention label to mark legal files stored in a Microsoft SharePoint Online document library as regulatory records.
What can you do to the legal files?
options: Remove the retention label of the files.
Edit the content of the files.
Move the files to a different folder within the document library.
Change the retention label of the files.
